vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of bagged ice for citywide use - SCIH Ice Holdings, Inc. dba Reddy Ice LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Estimated amount of $724,901.20 - Financing:  General Fund ($129,251.20), Sanitation Operation Fund ($457,150.00), and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($138,500.00)
